about_the_game:
Welcome to Bone Dust, skill-based arena shooter/bullet hell experience set in a nightmare circus! In this fast-paced FPS, you'll take on the role of a magician who uses her playing cards as a weapon to battle against waves of horrendous enemies in a closed arena environment.

Key Features:

  • Fast-paced, arcade-style gameplay
  • Fight your way to the global leaderboard
  • Unique nightmare circus theme
  • Play as a magician and use your playing cards as a weapon
  • Epic boss battle in a closed arena

The arena is set, your deck is shuffled. Time to face the horror...

With arcade-style gameplay and epic boss battles, Bone Dust will keep you coming back for more. Put your skills to the test and see if you have what it takes to emerge victorious in the nightmare circus.

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Win 10
  • Processor: Dual Core 2.4 GHz or better
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Intel HD Graphics 620 or better
  • DirectX: Version 10
  • Storage: 150 MB available space
  • Sound Card: DirectX

Recommended:

short_description: Enter Bone Dust, an adrenaline-fueled arena shooter with bullet hell dynamics. Engage in swift, arcade-inspired gameplay, and face off against terrifying adversaries using your magical deck of cards. Prove your mettle and climb to the top of the global leaderboard!
